552310.name: Anguished
552310.description:
Anguished is a horror-psychological rpg type. You will play as a man of unknown age or origin waking up in a place, not knowing how you got there or what exactly is ,,there" . You will solve different puzzles, run from darkness and try to find the truth behind this weird place, all of that while trying to not die from the different traps and monsters. The more you advance in story the harder it will be and more death traps will await you.

Discover memories and collect them to discover the truth behind the place.

Features:

1) Retro Graphics
The game features pixelated graphics to give you a retro yet familiar feeling.

2) Horror Atmoshpere
Darkness, scary sounds and a monster that always fallows you will always keep you on your toes.

3) Puzzles and Challenges
One wrong choice and you end up dead, complete the puzzles as fast as possible if you want to keep your sanity.
552310.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
